name: CannonBall
description:
"CannonBall" is a casual shooting game that trains the nerve reflex ability. Operate the mouse to rotate the turret, shoot bullets to hit the ball, and pass the level within a limited number of times!
In the selection interface, you can choose the ray mode or the normal mode. In the ray mode, when the small ball shot from the turret can hit the white ball, a ray will appear.

Game Features
1. The difficulty will continue to rise with the level
2. The ball rotates with variable speed
3. There are different mechanics to play the game
4. Play with lighthearted music
